title: Organization
description: information that uniquely identifies an organized entity such as company, non-profit, government agency or educational institution, plus additional information that further qualifies the organization.

xdm:id.title: Organization Id
xdm:id.description: A unique identifier for the organization.

xdm:legalName.title: Organization Name
xdm:legalName.description: The official name of the organization.

xdm:numberOfEmployees.title: Number of Employees
xdm:numberOfEmployees.description: The number of employees the organization has.

xdm:industry.title: Industry
xdm:industry.description: The the industry that this organization is a part of.

xdm:duns.title: Dun & Bradstreet number
xdm:duns.description: The Dun & Bradstreet DUNS number for identifying an organization or business person.

xdm:website.title: Web Site
xdm:website.description: The url of the organization's website.

xdm:marketSegment.title: Market Segment
xdm:marketSegment.description: The named market segment that the organization participates in.

xdm:location.title: Location
xdm:location.description: The location of the organization's main office.

xdm:rating.title: Rating
xdm:rating.description: The calculated score or star rating for this organization.
